#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int n;
  cin>>n;
  char **str1 = new char*[n];
  char **str2 = new char*[n];
  int i,j,k,a=0,b=0;
  for(i=0;i<n;i++)
  {
  	str1[i] = new char[21];
  	str2[i] = new char[21];
  	cin>>str1[i]>>str2[i];
  }
  for(i=0;i<n;i++)
  {
  	if(strlen(str1[i])==strlen(str2[i]))
  	{
	  for(j=0;j<strlen(str1[i]);j++)
	  	{ 
	  	    a=0;b=0;
	  		for(k=0;k<strlen(str1[i]);k++)
	  		{
		  		if(str1[i][j]==str1[i][k])
		  		{
		  			a++;
		  		}
		  		if(str1[i][j]==str2[i][k])
		  		{
		  			b++;
		  		}
		  		
		  	}
		 if(a!=b)
		 {
 			cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
 			break;
 		} 	
	  	}
	  	 if(a==b)
		 {
 			cout<<"YES"<<"\n";;
 		}
	  }
	  else
	  {
  		cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
      }
  }
  return 0;	
}
